channel.title: Adding commands on a 562
channel.description: Hey, How do i add a command to my server its "Frostrealm Client 1" But he took it down But i need to know how to add a command thanks(:

item.title: Adding commands on a 562
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

Why has your server name ‘Client’ in it?

Read full topic

item.title: Adding commands on a 562
item.dc:creator: @modzilla modzilla
item.description:
@modzilla wrote:

thats for ::spec unlimited special

if(cmd[0].startsWith("spec") && (player.coowner == 1 || player.getUsername().equals("") || player.getUsername().equals("your name"))) { if (player.getRights() < 2) return; player.specialAmount = 100000; player.sm("You now have an unlimited amount of special."); }

::hp heals Hitpoints

if (cmd[0].equals("hp") && player.owner == 1) { player.getSkills().heal(255); player.sm("You have been heald by the gods!"); }

I dont have one for prayer

Read full topic

item.title: Adding commands on a 562
item.dc:creator: @codyskate5021 codyskate5021
item.description:
@codyskate5021 wrote:

[quote=“Lil wayne fan, post:5, topic:417360”][quote author=codyskate5021 link=topic=519914.msg3775332#msg3775332 date=1318041959]

Lol im just glad that I still have the. Rar files from frostrealm saved on my computer!
[/quote] i got rid of mine i dont want to take the time and fix the mapdata

Yes 562 commands I wanna add like ::spec and ::hp and ::prayer for like unlimted stats.
know anyway i can do that?[/quote]

why dont you just use the epicme command and if there isnt one make one

Read full topic
